channel.title: Captains-logs on Vite & Rêves
channel.description: Recent content in Captains-logs on Vite & Rêves

item.title: 2019-09-25 Monemvasia
item.description: At: Monemvasia, Peloponnesos, Greece Today, the weather was its usual Greek self again. Not a smidgen of thunderstorm in sight, only deep blue skies and a little breeze.

item.title: 2019-09-24 Avlaki Bay to Monemvasia
item.description: From: Avlaki bay, Peloponnesos, Greece To: Monemvasia, Peloponnesos, Greece We left Avlaki bay around 10 in the morning. The wind was a nice 10 knots, and for a while, we were cruising with the wind on our beam, full sails out.

item.title: 2019-09-23 Avlaki Bay
item.description: At: Avlaki bay, Peloponnesos, Greece Avlaki bay is magnificent. About half a mile long and 300m wide, surrounded on three sides by steep mountains, with a half sand, half pebble beach, and most important for sailors: a sandy bottom.

item.title: 2019-09-22 Hydra to Avlaki Bay
item.description: From: Hydra, island Hydra, Greece To: Avlaki bay, Peloponnesos, Greece The wind was ok this morning. It had decreased during the night and the sea outside also looked less agitated.

item.title: 2019-09-21 Hydra
item.description: At: Hydra, island Hydra, Greece At night, the wind picked up. A lot. A northern wind, and we were tied to the south side. Not good.

item.title: 2019-09-20 Hydra
item.description: From: Mandraki bay, island Hydra, Greece To: Hydra, island Hydra, Greece The wind didn’t shift during the night after all. It shifted during the morning when we were contemplating having breakfast.

item.title: 2019-09-19 Lavrion to Hydra
item.description: From: Lavrion Port, Greece To: Mandraki bay, island Hydra, Greece Some days are perfect sailing days. So was this one. 15 knots, downwind sailing, almost no waves.

item.title: 2019-09-18 Lavrion
item.description: From: Lavrion Olympic Marine, Greece To: Lavrion Port, Greece We wanted to be closer to the Lavrion shops and restaurants, so we moved Vite & Rêves to the town port.

item.title: 2019-09-17 Lavrion
item.description: At: Lavrion Olympic Marine, Greece We’re getting ready to leave for our world trip. We took 5 small suitcases and 2 big ones of clothes and stuff, 3 kids and 2 Parents with us.
